casebody.data:
No. 15, original.

Kansas v. Missouri. June 3, 1940. Messrs. Jay S. Parker, Attorney General of Kansas, A. B. Mitchell, Assistant Attorney General, Clarence V. Beck, and Errett P. Scrivner for complainant. Mr. Robert Stone for E. A. Cole.

Motion of E. A. Cole for leave to file a Bill of Intervention denied.
